website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if you’re looking for a more affordable way to provide your best friend with all the benefits of a balanced raw diet.
pros: Contains human-grade ingredients that are comparable to more expensive options
Single-source meat-based recipe boasts a high protein content, necessary fiber from produce, and essential vitamins and minerals
Enriched with omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids
Free of grains, additives, and fillers
Suitable for everyday feeding or as a topper
Made with ingredients sourced in the USA
cons: Most dogs love it, but extremely picky eaters may still turn their snouts up at some of the flavors

customer_reviews.title: Dont always cheap out  Most of the time it doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a brand called Dr Marty freeze dried dog food It was expensive, so I thought I would try a brand close to what I got, but cheaper It wasn't anything like Dr Marty It did not soften and was a poorer quality than what I had purchased previously I had to return to the more expensive, higher quality brand for my dogs but Im glad I did
customer_reviews.author: Marti Mulholland

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent - this bag made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered the chicken and salmon several times and our dog really enjoyed it. Unfortunately, our most recent order resulted in our dog getting sick. She threw up multiple times after eating her dinner (it was the first meal she had from this particular bag of Stewart Raw). When we smelled the food in the bag, it had a weird, almost plastic-y smell to it. Definitely a different smell from all the other bags we had received in the past. Really unfortunate because up until now, we liked this product.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes the Stewart food alright--he'll eat anything--but I don't see how it was better than all the other raw foods I've tried and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's my fault for not carefully checking the size of the package. It never occurred to me that a 3.5 oz. trial size bag of dog food would cost $18.13 which would come to about $75 for one pound. For $24, I could buy 2 lbs. of USA-produced freeze-dried food; for $34, I could buy 2.2 lbs. of a brand imported from New Zealand. My dog likes the Stewart food alright--he'll eat anything--but I don't see how it was better than all the other raw foods I've tried and I won't be buying it again--a total rip-off.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Extremely picky dogs ate right up!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle product. My extremely picky Coton de tulear pups took to this food the minute I set it down and ate it all. That has never happened with any dog food I have set out. I have tried ALL kinds. I will admit I didn’t think this stuff would be any different because I had bought another brand of raw food that they turned their nose up to and boy was I shocked when they immediately started eating. They are too spoiled with table scraps that I was afraid they would never go back to dog food, but this stuff is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Beck L.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it, increasing price ehh not so much
customer_reviews.text: My dog with kidney failure was going to have to be put down until we switch to this food. It helped improve his kidney function and the limited ingredients are easy for him to process. I cant say it will work for every one but we are almost 2 years past his diagnosis and he is still with us. I know its a temporary fix he feels better and his quality of life has improved. I am considering change it because of the recent price jump of over $10 very inconsistent , and the food has recently not been consistent in appearance or texture. I hate to change but I will look for alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: wallace

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION!MADE MY 5 DOGS SICK!
customer_reviews.text: This caused my pug to vomit and made all five dogs have yellowish slimy puke!It should be recalled!I believe that they are not having proper third party testing and regulation of this product.Expensive mistake=vet bills!As I write this my poor minpin is outside walking around the yard looking for areas to puke and purge his ramcid meal.Thanks a lot Stewarts and to shame on you as a company that fails to regulate their product quality.I will NEVER trust you again.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolove

customer_reviews.title: Really good food
customer_reviews.text: Been feeding Stewart raw on and off for months. I usually feed my dogs homemade raw, but there are those days where one forgets to thaw their food. This freeze dried food it’s a great alternative when I don’t have time to thaw their food. It’s not overly expensive like other freeze dried dog food and has really good ingredients that I trust and feel comfortable feeding my pups. Oh and they absolutely love it!!! They will sit and beg for their food. And they can also work as a food topper and treats :)
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it’s powder
customer_reviews.text: This is awful. Very few nuggets..it’s like powder! For the price you pay ! I am so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: book man

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it and I feel I am doing something extra good for her!
customer_reviews.text: This was the most reasonably priced raw food and my dog just loves it. I give her 1/4 of the raw food with her kibble. I crush the raw food in a little bit of water and then mix it with her dry food. I have never seen her eat so heartily and enjoy her meal. I was worried that raw food would have a strong smell, but it is pleasant and very easy to use dry or mixed with a bit of water. My dog is small, a 22 pound Jack Russell and with feeding her 1/4 of her diet raw, the bag lasted almost a month. Very pleased with Steward Raw Naturals.
customer_reviews.author: Softsong

customer_reviews.title: Best commercial food
customer_reviews.text: I did major research on dog food, determined to find the best commercial dog food available. Since I do not have time to prepare the food myself, I believe I've found the next best alternative. I believe in a raw diet for dogs (and cats). My Boston terrier is thriving on it. She's 10 now and acts like a puppy. She coat glistens, and she has an abundance of energy.
customer_reviews.author: Writeway

customer_reviews.title: Stale product
customer_reviews.text: This product smells stale, like stale potatoe chips that have been left open and my dogs won't eat it, I always buy Stewart's, but this one no good, I checked dates to make sure of no outdated of product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbra Cesolini

customer_reviews.title: My doxie loves Stewart Freeze Dried Dog Food.
customer_reviews.text: I just started feeding my dog raw food. I tried two different companies and my dog loves Stewart Freeze Dried Dog Food. It's complete nutrition and you do not need to add anything but water. They come in small heart shaped nuggets that you don't need to crumble yourself like other brands. Just add water and they soften quickly. My dog's skin allergies looked great, ears looked great and his adult fur started to soften like puppy fur. All after just one week of feeding. And he loves the lamb flavor. Looking forward to tying other flavors. Cheers to Stewart Freeze Dried Dog Food!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good dog teat product.
customer_reviews.text: I 've been feeding my Mini Pincher as a supplement to her other diet. As a raw freeze dried food it is well balanced. I also make my own raw food for her and use this as just a treat. This product is made in the USA and i've contacted the manufacture as to quality control in how the product is made. I feel confident this is a very good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Com

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! I got a bag full of dust!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Based on my experience with the small and medium patties , I decided to order these for training treats since they were small. I added it to my subscriptions and was all set to wait almost 18-25 days like it stated for the arrival but it came within 2 days of ordering. Great, but when I opened the bag, it was mostly dust, not small hearts like stated on the package. Bummer! I can’t use these for training treats like I wanted too. I guess I’ll go back to my vital essentials freeze dried treats that are the perfect training size. Calling to return them ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Tanich2uTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pet Loves it. Eats it. No obvious problems
customer_reviews.text: Good food. However seems to vary on smell upon opening a good bit; enjoy using it for convenience but in honesty maybe able to make your own foods at a more consistent quality. As there appears always a Big price gap in sale vs regular price point. Could be clearing product during a sale? Unsure but We always try to do the best for our pets. I do and would recommend the product for our pet will consume it and has no problems digestion wise; which is a Noted Blessing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda123

customer_reviews.title: Beware. Bloody Diarrhea explosion.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say, but this product made all 3 of my GSD's sick. I was just adding 1cup on top of their regular food. 4th day after adding i came home to dog bloody diarrhea all over my house. This poop explosion continued for several days as each dog was effected at different rate. Stopped the food immediately as this was the only change in their diet before poop explosion. Vet suggested pepto and that finally worked. No issues since and back to their regular dog food only. Amazon refunded with no problen and said i could keep product. Not sure how to dispose of as i do not want any onimals to possibly get into this and get sick!
customer_reviews.author: Womack.Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients. My dog love loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a liver tumor. It was recommended that I feed her a freeze dried raw food. This has all the ingredients plus some internal organs that her body needs. She really likes it. She loves this stuff even when I douse it with her liquid and dry herbals. It can be used as is. I add water to rehydrate it. Stores well when hydrated in a ziplock bag and is easy to dispense. Lily approves. Good value too
customer_reviews.author: Hollwire

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it as food or treat, made the raw switch easy!
customer_reviews.text: I used this food to switch my dogs to a raw diet. They love the flavor, whether I serve it to them dry or moistened with water. I prefer to feed them food that is fresh rather than freeze dried; however, I have found this product to be a good supplement when I don't have their regular food on hand, when I am having someone pet sit them, or when we are traveling and can't refrigerate their regular food. I also give them the cute little heart shaped kibbles as a treat sometimes, which is much better than a wheat based product.
customer_reviews.author: amandaw22us

customer_reviews.title: Happy, Healthy Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Mix Stewart's freeze-dried dog bites with organic turkey bone broth and other fresh dog food. Both my Boston's go crazy for the freeze-dried food and know when it is not added (only when I run out!). Thank you for making such a healthy, vitamin-packed tasty food that keeps my dogs' coats shiny and their energy level in the plus zone. PS, love the heart shapes!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse2talk2

customer_reviews.title: My dogs will not even go near their bowl with this food in it
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I am writing this review because I was seeking a less expensive freeze dried food compared to the Stella and Chewy's I was feeding as a mixer. Opened the food and this chicken/salmon version smelled so bad. I put the food in my two older dogs bowls and the puppy version I also purchased in the new puppy's bowl. Whoa! I have never seen these three back away from food so fast. They would not go near it again until I threw it out (outside the house) and washed their bowls. Old food back in the bowls - they ate a usual.
customer_reviews.author: Dyson

customer_reviews.title: Topper for my dog’s regular food
customer_reviews.text: I can’t afford to feed my 70 pound dog only this food, but because I want her to have the nutrition of raw, I top off her regular dog food with a dozen or so of these little pieces. She always eats these first, and I even sometimes use them as treats. She likes all the flavors, but just be prepared that the lamb flavor has a strange smell.
customer_reviews.author: alexa

customer_reviews.title: My Poodles Love This...
customer_reviews.text: My standard poodles love this product. I use it as a topper for their kibble in the morning and they can hardly wait to dig in. I have also been using it as.a training treat because they are eager to leatn when they know that this is their reward. Highly Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robin K

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like this food.. my vet said dogs need taurine didn't see this listed in ingredients so not sure about it, also not sure about fat content because both my dogs have gained unneeded weight.. so not sure if it good for my dogs..
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Hard nuggets
customer_reviews.text: I have dachshunds and they are not picky eaters. This was a good price. However I noticed that the beef nuggets do not rehydrate well and remain hard after days of soaking. More similar to Primal nuggets than Stella and Chewy Freeze dried. But significantly less expensive. And dogs seem happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1

customer_reviews.title: Rancid
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, Amazon for a full refund of the three bags I purchase as all of them were rancid despite the expiration date. We will continue to purchase this brand in the turkey, beef and lamb as we have never had a problem with those and our dogs love them.
customer_reviews.author: alinakay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used it for treats because I had gotten two kinds . For Shih Tzu good product just a little spendy
customer_reviews.author: Godzgrl

customer_reviews.title: Dusty
customer_reviews.text: I am very sorry, I don’t like to give an adverse opinion but I think that if others would it I wouldn’t have purchase it. I can not talk about nutrition and freshness I think is ok, but it became dusty only a few pieces keep complete and my dog started sneezing because she inhale the powder while eating it. I don’t know how about other breeds but this was our experience with a Boxer. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Raiz

customer_reviews.title: Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, very good for your dog, BUT you can buy it on chewy.com for $31.37 all the time. Amazon is VERY high priced for this.
customer_reviews.author: jean e

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves the food, I love the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog food. I was using a more expensive brand of freeze dried raw. I was looking for cheaper alternatives that didn’t have added carbs, like potatoes. This one is perfect. It has similar ingredients and calorie content as our old food, but it’s almost half the price. Plus I love the cute heart shaped pieces. My dog just gobbles this up. Even my roommate’s cat tries to steal it.
customer_reviews.author: Krh

customer_reviews.title: Crumbly
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item several times and the texture is as should be ... but this recent bag was all in shreds and crumbly, more like a powder. Was not happy this time - no nuggets in this bag just powder.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Came almost all crumbled!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved this food but unfortunately it came mostly crumbled to powder so it was lost because he would not eat it crumbled or reconstituted in water as a puree. I gave it to stars because I lost have the bag since it was mostly crumbled.
customer_reviews.author: Sheba Shuber

customer_reviews.title: Simply the BEST
customer_reviews.text: My family has included dogs for decades and we've always had trouble finding the perfect food for our canine family members. We were so happy to find Stewart some years ago and our current dog absolutely loves it. Sometimes he prefers it dry, sometimes moist/rehydrated, sometimes we heat it up in a saucepan and cook it a bit. It is by far the healthiest food other than home cooking that we've ever found. The BEST!
customer_reviews.author: Carol R.

customer_reviews.title: Very strong scent
customer_reviews.text: My dogs seem to like it but I’m not very thrilled with the added garlic, if I feed them in the kitchen and leave the room and come back I can smell this food before I enter the room, it’s very overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Chicky

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is a picky eater. I feed her mainly kibble but add a little wet food to give her some variety. I usually use about 1/4 can of wet food per meal and she loses interest after the first meal and only picks at her food after that so I need to constantly switch flavors to keep her interested. I've been adding Stewart Raw Naturals Freeze Dried Dog Food to the kibble for a few weeks now and she licks her bowl clean almost every time and doesn't seem to get bored with it. I'll definitely be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nutritious, and My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchase the beef and turkey in the brand typically but decided to try this one as the others were out of stock. (The lamb is a bit more expensive). Dogs love it! We used to make homemade raw dog food but find this brand to be much more convenient and full of great ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: alinakay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, healthy alternative to both grain free commercial dog foods and homemade raw diets.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had found this food earlier. I'm so impressed with the quality and nutrition. My aging pitbull has a lot of allergies and a finicky stomach. I started researching homeopathic raw diets, but was concerned about the potential for cross-contamination if I made raw food for him at home. Then I found Stewarts, and was thrilled to see that they included a lot of the antioxidant-rich whole foods recommended for immune support in their food. It also helps that my very picky dog, LOVES this food, and it's gentle on his digestive system. My cat will even occasionally steal a bite or two.
customer_reviews.author: Lrnator

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously overpriced for a trial size
customer_reviews.text: The star is actually just for the size and price. The product itself is amazing, but when ordering, I thought I was actually ordering the 12oz bag and didn't realize this was a 3.25oz bag for basically half what I pay for a 24 oz bag. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Jes A.

customer_reviews.title: HALF PULVERIZED 3rd time.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review. I do love this food and all it's benefits. However, the, last few bags have arrived with half the pieces pulverized. Once is maybe a fluke, but this is the third bag that I have opened with half the contents turned to powder. Makes it difficult to feed the right amount. It's the poultry flavors that have been the most problematic. Why not use the same box packaging that the larger patties come in? For the price of this food, they should insure we receive the item intact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog liked this!!
customer_reviews.text: I might try this flavor again for my dog...it was the ONLY one of the 3 flavors I tried that didn't come all broken up with half the bag all crumbles, which she wouldn't touch.. She actually preferred the chicken flavor but that and the turkey came half smashed and unedible for her.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Great For Small Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog with many teeth pulled. He can easily chew these and loves them. He occasionally has stomach issues and this brand has done very well with those issues and his stool is nice and firm.
customer_reviews.author: Sock Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product, but expensive way to feed
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a quality product. I had tried one other brand, and this one smells much better, and rehydrates better. My dogs are not picky at all, so they wolf it down. It is quite an expensive way to feed, though. My dogs are small, so a bag lasted quite a while, but a bigger dog would cost a fortune to feed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great product, be sure to open and smell for freshness
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love this food; however, we received two bags that were not good and my dogs wouldn't eat it. The first bag I ordered was great, it was the second bag that I received that was bad (smelled like cardboard). This is real food, it should smell fresh. Amazon replaced it without requiring me to send it back. That replacement was also bad so I called the company directly. They have wonderful customer service. They already recognized the problem and are sending me two free bags to replace the ones I could not use.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Almquist

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Likes it
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you about flavor because I did not taste it. My dog loves it, I break 4 or 5 of them and mix it in with her other food
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Smells like real meat. Dog LOVES IT.
customer_reviews.text: My beagle LOVES this food. I use it as a mixer with her morning meal and she does a very impatient happy dance while I let it soak in the hot water I pour on it. Then I mix in some Orijen brand dry food and she devours it. 🐶😊
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: My dog wont eat it
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was great you got more for your money than with other raw food choices but, my dog wont eat it. She did try to eat it. I tried moist, dry, mixing it with other, but no luck. If your dog is a fast eater that gobbles up food this should be great but my girl said no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cash

customer_reviews.title: Good treats
customer_reviews.text: They like this fine and it's a good size for treats. It helps control weight on my mom's inactive dog. My dogs prefer the primal nuggets for topping off the food, but this is a better form for treats and they like it. I researched because of my mom's dog and concluded they are close to 10 calories per piece.
customer_reviews.author: FJMShopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect appetizer or treat!
customer_reviews.text: These treats are loved by all 3 of my furbabies. One is a very picky eater, so I use a couple of these as an appetizer for each of her meals. She’ll first eat the liver treats then she keeps on going to finish all her meal. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Sharon Bucholz

customer_reviews.title: Rancid bags
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product for a long time. Unfortunately 4 of the last 5 bags I purchased were spoiled. I don’t know what the issue is but I had to cancel my subscription. They smelled rancid and made my dog sick.
customer_reviews.author: Gigiatl

customer_reviews.title: My dog wouldn't eat it
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a cheaper alternative to Primal Raw Dog food, but my dog ate it the first couple of times and then started to get a very sad look on her face when I gave it to her and finally turned her nose to it. It seems the same as Primal nuggets to me (different shape, though), but clearly I don't know from raw dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: smells old
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a bag when opened it smelled old...I only put a fewpellets in with my dogs regular food. he got sick, returned and got a new bag.... same problem...the first bag I bought never had any problem. Yes had a smell but did not smell old and my dog loved it. Could it be a bad batch??
customer_reviews.author: barbara wehrs

customer_reviews.title: Doggie loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Great food. Use as a supplement with her fresh food. She has more energy, better digestion, nicer coat.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Bowl problem GONE
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 6 years old. For 6 years she had bowl problems. This food straighten her out in less than a week. She went from going up to 4 times a day to once, maybe twice. I was amazed. I just wish the price was a little better. She weighs about 12 lbs. I give her the food twice a day so the bag doesn't last long. I still highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Roehrs

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: My dogs eat these crumbled on top of food or for treats. Okay for diabetic dog
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A King

customer_reviews.title: Smells Bad
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this brand before in the Lamb flavor but when I opened this package a few days ago, the contents smelled like rancid oil. Unfortunately I waited too long before opening the package and my return date was passed. Have been pleased with previous packages of the Lamb so not sure if this is the way it's supposed to smell or if I got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: CinLJ55

customer_reviews.title: High Fat Content
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it, but she has gained weight and her triglycerides are through the roof now. She is 13 and not very active so I presume that is a factor. I need to switch her to a very low fat diet now. Probably great for a younger more active dog.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to rehydrate
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are enjoying easy to rehydrate part of mix I make for them with little of those questionable ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: My dog eats his food better
customer_reviews.text: I add a handful, moisten, and my dog eats it all!
customer_reviews.author: Proud Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Finally a healthy dog food made in the USA that dogs love
customer_reviews.text: After lots of searching and research into the best foods for our canine family members, we found Stewart. Their food is absolutely top quality and our pups adore it. Their skin is healthy, coat shiny, eyes bright, teeth great (of course we brush them too) and high energy levels. Can't say enough good things about Stewart products.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R.

customer_reviews.title: Chiquaqua food
customer_reviews.text: OMG, the pack loves this. Very easy and fast to prepare. All the nutrition they need.
customer_reviews.author: William E Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Natural without the garbage, and doggie likes it.
customer_reviews.text: I finally fed this to my picky doggie, and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: kathyk

customer_reviews.title: My fur baby loves thi
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 year old long haired Chihuahua and he LOVES it....he licked the bowl clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Great as a food topper!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a food topper for my greyhounds' kibble. It's easy to crumble with your fingers, and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jan T

customer_reviews.title: Dogs say it’s tasty.
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes this. I add it to her dry food sometimes. It is expensive when feeding a standard poodle. It’s reasonable when feeding a small yorkie size.
customer_reviews.author: My Jupiter

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: This really is good. They snarf it right down. Takes a long time to rehydrate. I just put it in water and they drink the water while eating it to make sure they have enough liquid with it. Been using more for training treats though.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. Like paper mache. Smells awful, my dog turned her face away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog needs to like it
customer_reviews.text: My dog would not even touch this I looked at it looks like dried tofu my dog said yuck
customer_reviews.author: Laurel smith

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fluff up much once you add water, but the water to food ratio won’t cause it to be soupy either. My dog seemed to like the taste. However, she isn’t picky as she eats a variety of brands and flavors. She had no issues while eating this.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever, just crumble on dry cibble dogs go crazy for it.. it's like Crack to them .. don't get beef though they didn't like I have picky Shepeherds..
customer_reviews.author: Debbra Cesolini

customer_reviews.title: My Yorkie loves this food.
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie absolutely loves this. I mix it with water because she won't drink water at all. I just ordered more flavors, she thinks she's getting a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie Vans

customer_reviews.title: Doggy approved
customer_reviews.text: Doggy approved. I break it up into crumbled chunks and soak in water for a bit and he likes gobbling it up. This chicken flavor seems to be better at crumbling than the beef.
customer_reviews.author: Ty m.

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: my aussie is a fussy eater but she goes for these cubes every morning. I know she's getting the nutrition she needs.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Products has gone bad half the time!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd or 4th time recently that we received a bag of food that seems to have gone bad! It crumbles to pieces like sawdust & smells rotten compared to the good, fresh bags we’ve had of this stuff. My dogs have sensitive tummies as is, so I don’t want to feed them something that’s gone bad & could make them sick. I’m definitely thinking I need to switch brands, even though they typically love this stuff. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Pets love it!
customer_reviews.text: This food of expensive, but we use them for dog and cat treats and one bag lasted a month. The pets love it as a treat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect food for rescued mill dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Mill dogs get their teeth extracted after rescue, this is a perfect food that is tasty and isnt full of water or by products. It's great for them. GO RESCUE!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food
customer_reviews.text: Of all the favors of this dog food, Lamb is good (and only second to Beef) for my dog's preferences
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food!
customer_reviews.text: I had an extremely finicky eater in my home. I no longer have that problem since she’s been on this food. She licks the bowl clean morning and evening. It’s been over a month and she’s doing great. I notice a change in her coat softness too. Good all around experience.
customer_reviews.author: Wynn dealer

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was sample size but great product. Top quality. My Rexie loves this. He never liked kibble. I agree it was too expensive for that size.
customer_reviews.author: Karen V. Stefanini

customer_reviews.title: Picky dogs will love this
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a topper for all 3 dogs and they love the taste!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: Dog would not eat it
customer_reviews.text: My dog refused to eat it and it smelled bad
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will love it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog will pick out these chunks first and leave the other dry dog food. That’s how much he loves this product
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H. Brenner

customer_reviews.title: My Chinese Crested loves this food
customer_reviews.text: Sure wish you would make the salmon one in the larger bag. I have to order it too often
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Kirby loves Stewart Freeze Dried
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Our Kirby James really likes it and it is good for him.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kellum

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: These are a regular part of our treat routine, both dogs love them.
customer_reviews.author: Plaguedoll

customer_reviews.title: Best freeze dried food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it and the pellet style is by far the easiest to serve to your dog of the freeze dried types. I've tried them all and you need to break most of them up when you re hydrate or wait a long time. This its pour in the bowl and add water.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Price Increase :(
customer_reviews.text: Well my dog likes it, Ive not tried it. Loved the price point of $34 and have ordered for a handful of times up until today when I went to reorder, and all of a sudden one month later pricing has climbed +20% ($7 difference). Sorry this product is no longer the value we once appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: mcm

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and SAFE
customer_reviews.text: We have a small rescue dog that has had several bouts with pancreatitis, this food causes him no issues and he loves it so we also use it for his treats.
customer_reviews.author: Marrtian Recording

customer_reviews.title: Throw up!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I gave a couple of these with my dogs meal she ate them with gusto and after her meal she would throw everything up. I tried giving her just one with her meal and she threw that up too! Unfortunately, my return window has passed so I’ll stuck with a food product that I am throwing away! Not a happy customer😡
customer_reviews.author: Loraine Shue-Weber

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, good value, comparatively, our dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: David Livingston

customer_reviews.title: dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: My dog is used to home-made gourmet food and he will actually eat this!! Good for travel or the times when we are too busy to make his food.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleDdog

customer_reviews.title: great food, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: low odor and very easy to feed. I use this as a topper with dry food. my labs love it. I also give it to them as a treat sometimes. it is very expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: bloodhound 1955

customer_reviews.title: Mastiffs love it
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this! And if I’d feed our mastiffs 100% raw Id be looking at a bill of $500/month. This way we supplement the raw with freeze dried and it saves our wallet, and they absolutely love it. Picky eaters never stood a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jehn

customer_reviews.title: Dogs are super happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: my dogs used to graze throughout the day because they weren't excited to eat but now they (3) all clamor around to see if I drop a couple of these in their bowl. they love them.
customer_reviews.author: JenS.

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't get over the smell
customer_reviews.text: My dog liked this one but the smell was bad and it took forever to soften with the warm water!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: My dogs didn’t like it.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs wouldn’t eat it dry or mixed. Gave it to my neighbor to see how her dog felt about it.
customer_reviews.author: Gail H. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Usually great, this bag not
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting this for a while now, and the bag this replaced smelled old and bad. This one did as well. Maybe check the whole lot?
customer_reviews.author: Lori R. Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, my dogs absolutely love this food. It’s defin more expensive than some other brands but I think the quality of ingredients make up for that.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it , I use it as a topper
customer_reviews.author: Cat3

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love them.
customer_reviews.text: We love these. We have a seventeen year old that only eats a few bites of food at a time. I keep these in jars through the house and hand them out like treats. I think the ingredients have been great for her eyes and skin. My five dogs give them five paws way up🐾
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food, however
customer_reviews.text: This is good dog food but for some reason the Chicken flavor is not the favorite for my dogs
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: My dog was sick on this product
customer_reviews.text: My dog was sick on this product and I was unable to return it even though I had plenty of time on the return window it would not allow me to.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

product_meta.title: Stewart Raw Naturals Freeze Dried Dog Food Grain Free Made in USA
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Beef| Size:24 oz.Love and Excitement in Every Bite
Stewart Raw Naturals freeze dried food is inspired by dogs’ natural diet rich in animal protein. We insist on the highest quality standards and USDA-certified ingredients to ensure that you're providing safe dog food that’s packed with nutrition to support health and wellness. 

The benefits of our complete and balanced Fresh to Home recipe will show in your dog’s healthy coat and shining eyes. 

Thoughtfully Sourced and Made in the USA
Our ingredients are locally sourced and gently processed in the heart of the Midwest under our own roof, to use with confidence under yours. 

Once we finish one bag we’ll order another one in a different flavor so my pup doesn’t get bored! --Steven L. 

Stewart Raw Naturals freeze dried dog food is all-natural and nutrient dense. Pet parents choose our foods because they are gluten free, grain free, additive free and full of lean protein and nutrition. 

Limited Ingredient Dog Food for Every Dog
Stewart Raw Naturals freeze dried foods are crazy-delicious and excellent for dogs of all sizes and ages. With 44 years of experience with dog food and treats, Stewart offers seven Fresh to Home recipes that are low in carbs to maintain healthy weight. Ideal for rotation diets or dogs with allergies. 

“My dogs love this product and they are picky!”
-Maro D. 

Choose Stewart Raw Naturals for Dogs
● Fresh, freeze dried food
● High protein, limited ingredient
● All natural, nothing added
● Made in the USA
● Mouth-wateringly delicious

The price is very economical for grain-free, HEALTHY, and freeze dried.
--D. Harris

Pet owners give Stewart “a round of appaws” for providing their best friends with balanced and delicious nutrition. 

Unleash nutrition and joy!
feature_bullets: HERITAGE OF TRUST: For over 44 years, we’ve been building on our heritage of trust by bringing you innovations like freeze dried dog food that locks in freshness
BEEF IS #1 INGREDIENT: Our limited-ingredient recipe contains no fillers and is 80% single-source protein, 18% fruits and vegetables, 2% vitamins and supplements
HUMAN-GRADE ingredients with the addition of ground bone as a source of calcium. Our Fresh to Home recipe has no artificial flavors, colors or preservatives
MADE IN THE USA: Thoughtfully sourced and produced in the heart of the Midwest
SUPPORTS SKIN AND COAT HEALTH with lean protein and a diet rich in antioxidants and Omega 3 and 7
GRAIN-FREE DOG FOOD: Plus, gluten free, soy free, carrageenan free, potato free and hypoallergenic. Everything dogs need and nothing they don’t
ADDS ENERGY AND VIGOR. Our healthy dog food is nutritious and delicious to help your dog thrive. Ideal for picky eaters of all ages and stages from puppies to senior dogs

HEALTHY ALL-NATURAL DOG FOOD: Good choice for food sensitivities, dogs with allergies or those on a limited-ingredient or rotation diet. Perfect for maintaining a healthy weight for all size dogs: small, medium and large
